title: What are the benefits of 5G smartphones? - Quora

response.answer_text: Emerging 5G networks feature lower latency, higher capacity, and increased bandwidth compared to 4G. These network improvements will have far-reaching impacts on how people live, work, and play all over the world. In addition to supporting the traditional apps such as browing, calling, chatting - 5G smartphones would support new features such as: Augmented Reality / Virtual RealityHigh Speed Online GamingUninterrupted Live Video Calling among multiple users (though 4G supports it… the quality is not great)Live Sports (you can see multiple camera angles from a single screen - because of the high bandwidth offered by 5G)
